formacao.title: My Formation
items: I completed high school at Colégio Energia between 2016 and 2019.
I then attended the Gaia preparatory course in the first semester of 2020.
In 2020.2 I entered the Law course at Unisul.
In 2022.1 I entered Information Systems at UFSC.
My graduation in Information Systems is scheduled for July 2026.

timeline.2022: I realized I love programming and withdrew from law school to join Information Systems at UFSC
timeline.2023: I started my journey as a Fullstack developer
timeline.2025: I joined Pixel as a Fullstack developer and REMA laboratory as a Backend developer
timeline.2026: Continue growing and learning as a developer

items.title: REMA Contaminant Calculation System
items.description: Web calculator for analysis of environmental contaminants, created for the REMA laboratory.

items.title: Creation, Manipulation and Validation of Asymmetric Keys
items.description: LABSEC Challenge - Creation of a Java system for generation, manipulation and validation of asymmetric keys using the BouncyCastle library. Additionally, the first 4 questions of Cryptopals

items.title: Binary Classifier with Machine Learning
items.description: Binary Classifier using two models: Naive Bayes and MLP.

items.title: Multithread Project in GO
items.description: Project developed in Go to demonstrate concepts of concurrent programming and multithreading.

items.title: Decision Tree in Python
items.description: Implementation of a decision tree from scratch in Python, with dynamic creation based on User Inputs.

items.title: Two-Dimensional Array
items.description: Implementation of a two-dimensional array in Python without using Python arrays, with features for insertion, removal and search of elements.

items.title: Multithreaded Game in C
items.description: Multithreaded game with access control of shared resources. Simultaneous Operators compete for limited resources (bridge access), demonstrating concepts of syncronization and prenvention of race conditions.
